client/src/components/ui/progress.tsx.content:
"use client"

import * as React from "react"
import * as ProgressPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-progress"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const Progress = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof ProgressPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof ProgressPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, value, ...props }, ref) => (
  <ProgressPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn(
      "relative h-4 w-full overflow-hidden rounded-full bg-secondary",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <ProgressPrimitive.Indicator
      className="h-full w-full flex-1 bg-primary transition-all"
      style={{ transform: `translateX(-${100 - (value || 0)}%)` }}
    />
  </ProgressPrimitive.Root>
))
Progress.displayName = ProgressPrimitive.Root.displayName

export { Progress }

client/src/components/ui/slider.tsx.content:
import * as React from "react"
import * as SliderPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-slider"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const Slider = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof SliderPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof SliderPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
  <SliderPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn(
      "relative flex w-full touch-none select-none items-center",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <SliderPrimitive.Track className="relative h-2 w-full grow overflow-hidden rounded-full bg-secondary">
      <SliderPrimitive.Range className="absolute h-full bg-primary" />
    </SliderPrimitive.Track>
    <SliderPrimitive.Thumb className="block h-5 w-5 rounded-full border-2 border-primary bg-background ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50" />
  </SliderPrimitive.Root>
))
Slider.displayName = SliderPrimitive.Root.displayName

export { Slider }

client/src/components/ui/scroll-area.tsx.content:
import * as React from "react"
import * as ScrollAreaPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-scroll-area"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const ScrollArea = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, children, ...props }, ref) => (
  <ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn("relative overflow-hidden", className)}
    {...props}
  >
    <ScrollAreaPrimitive.Viewport className="h-full w-full rounded-[inherit]">
      {children}
    </ScrollAreaPrimitive.Viewport>
    <ScrollBar />
    <ScrollAreaPrimitive.Corner />
  </ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root>
))
ScrollArea.displayName = ScrollAreaPrimitive.Root.displayName

const ScrollBar = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar>
>(({ className, orientation = "vertical", ...props }, ref) => (
  <ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar
    ref={ref}
    orientation={orientation}
    className={cn(
      "flex touch-none select-none transition-colors",
      orientation === "vertical" &&
        "h-full w-2.5 border-l border-l-transparent p-[1px]",
      orientation === "horizontal" &&
        "h-2.5 flex-col border-t border-t-transparent p-[1px]",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaThumb className="relative flex-1 rounded-full bg-border" />
  </ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar>
))
ScrollBar.displayName = ScrollAreaPrimitive.ScrollAreaScrollbar.displayName

export { ScrollArea, ScrollBar }

import { useAuth } from "@/hooks/use-auth"; import { useLanguage } from "@/lib/i18n"; import { Navbar } from "@/components/layout/Navbar"; import { Button } from "@/components/ui/button"; import { Avatar, AvatarFallback } from "@/components/ui/avatar"; import { LogOut, User, Mail, Phone, BadgeCheck } from "lucide-react"; export default function Profile() { const { user, logout, isLoggingOut } = useAuth(); const { t } = useLanguage(); if (!user) return null; return (

{t("profile.title")}

{/* Header Banner */}
{user.name.charAt(0)}

{user.name}

{user.role}

Username

{user.username}

Email

{user.email || 'Not provided'}

Mobile

{user.mobile || 'Not provided'}

); }

client/src/components/ui/checkbox.tsx.content:
import * as React from "react"
import * as CheckboxPrimitive from "@radix-ui/react-checkbox"
import { Check } from "lucide-react"

import { cn } from "@/lib/utils"

const Checkbox = React.forwardRef<
  React.ElementRef<typeof CheckboxPrimitive.Root>,
  React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef<typeof CheckboxPrimitive.Root>
>(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
  <CheckboxPrimitive.Root
    ref={ref}
    className={cn(
      "peer h-4 w-4 shrink-0 rounded-sm border border-primary ring-offset-background focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50 data-[state=checked]:bg-primary data-[state=checked]:text-primary-foreground",
      className
    )}
    {...props}
  >
    <CheckboxPrimitive.Indicator
      className={cn("flex items-center justify-center text-current")}
    >
      <Check className="h-4 w-4" />
    </CheckboxPrimitive.Indicator>
  </CheckboxPrimitive.Root>
))
Checkbox.displayName = CheckboxPrimitive.Root.displayName

export { Checkbox }

    "common.logout": "àª²à«àª àªàªàª",
    "common.offline": "àª¤àª®à« àªàª«àª²àª¾àªàª¨ àªà«. àª¸àª¾àªàªµà«àª² àª¡à«àªàª¾ àª¬àª¤àª¾àªµà« àª°àª¹à«àª¯à«àª àªà«.",
  },
};

const LanguageContext = createContext<LanguageContextType | undefined>(undefined);

export function LanguageProvider({ children }: { children: React.ReactNode }) {
  const [language, setLanguageState] = useState<Language>("en");

  useEffect(() => {
    const saved = localStorage.getItem("herbtrace-lang") as Language;
    if (saved && ["en", "hi", "mr", "gu"].includes(saved)) {
      setLanguageState(saved);
    }
  }, []);

  const setLanguage = (lang: Language) => {
    setLanguageState(lang);
    localStorage.setItem("herbtrace-lang", lang);
  };

  const t = (key: string, params?: Record<string, string | number>) => {
    let text = translations[language][key] || key;
    if (params) {
      Object.entries(params).forEach(([k, v]) => {
        text = text.replace(`{${k}}`, String(v));
      });
    }
    return text;
  };

  return (
    <LanguageContext.Provider value={{ language, setLanguage, t }}>
      {children}
    </LanguageContext.Provider>
  );
}

export function useLanguage() {
  const context = useContext(LanguageContext);
  if (!context) {
    throw new Error("useLanguage must be used within a LanguageProvider");
  }
  return context;
}

SelectTrigger, SelectContent, SelectLabel, SelectItem, SelectSeparator, SelectScrollUpButton, SelectScrollDownButton, }

)) NavigationMenuViewport.displayName = NavigationMenuPrimitive.Viewport.displayName const NavigationMenuIndicator = React.forwardRef< React.ElementRef, React.ComponentPropsWithoutRef >(({ className, ...props }, ref) => (
)) NavigationMenuIndicator.displayName = NavigationMenuPrimitive.Indicator.displayName export { navigationMenuTriggerStyle, NavigationMenu, NavigationMenuList, NavigationMenuItem, NavigationMenuContent, NavigationMenuTrigger, NavigationMenuLink, NavigationMenuIndicator, NavigationMenuViewport, }

}

{children}

design_guidelines.md.content:
# HerbTrace Design Guidelines

## Design Approach
**Hybrid System**: Material Design foundation with humanized elements. Drawing from Notion's approachable clarity and Linear's clean efficiency, adapted for agricultural context with rounded, friendly components that feel grounded and trustworthy.

## Typography
**Primary Font**: Inter or DM Sans (Google Fonts CDN)
**Secondary/Accent**: Merriweather or Lora for warmth in headings

**Hierarchy**:
- Hero Headlines: 3xl-5xl, medium weight, secondary font
- Section Titles: 2xl-3xl, semibold, primary font  
- Body Text: base-lg, regular weight, generous line-height (1.7)
- Data Labels: sm-base, medium weight, subtle uppercase tracking
- Form Labels: sm, medium weight, natural case (not uppercase - too corporate)

## Layout System
**Spacing Primitives**: Tailwind units of 3, 4, 6, 8, 12, 16
- Component padding: p-4 to p-6
- Section spacing: py-12 (mobile) to py-20 (desktop)
- Card gaps: gap-6 to gap-8
- Form field spacing: mb-4 to mb-6

**Containers**: max-w-6xl for content, max-w-4xl for forms

## Component Library

**Navigation**: 
Sticky top bar with soft shadow, rounded search input with icon, profile circle (not square), notification bell with badge count

**Cards**:
Rounded-xl corners, soft shadows (not harsh), generous padding (p-6), subtle hover lift effect. Farm/field cards include: location pin icon, crop type badge, quality status indicator, "View Details" text link (not button)

**Forms**:
- Rounded-lg inputs with visible borders (not underline-only)
- Floating labels inside inputs
- Helper text below fields in muted tone
- Large touch targets (min h-12)
- Success/error states with icons and gentle color treatment
- Submit buttons: Full or auto width depending on context, rounded-lg

**Data Display**:
- Quality metrics in card grid (2-3 columns desktop, 1 mobile)
- Timeline view for inspections: vertical line with circular nodes, date on left, details on right
- Status badges: rounded-full pills with icons
- Simple data tables with alternating row backgrounds, rounded corners

**Dashboard Widgets**:
Recent activity feed, quick stats cards (rounded corners, icon + number + label), upcoming inspections list with calendar icons

## Images

**Hero Section**: 
Full-width image of farmer inspecting crops in golden hour light (warm, authentic, not stock-photo perfect). Image height: 60vh desktop, 40vh mobile. Overlay: subtle gradient from bottom for text readability. Centered content: App logo/name, tagline ("Track Quality, Build Trust"), primary CTA button with backdrop-blur background.

**Section Images**:
- Features section: 2-column layout with image showing mobile app in farmer's hands in field
- Testimonial section: Circular profile photos of actual farmers (not generic headshots)
- How-it-works: Illustrated steps with simple icons showing inspection process

**Placeholder Strategy**: Use warm agricultural imagery - fields, fresh produce, farmers working, quality inspection close-ups

## Overall Structure

**Homepage Flow**:
1. Hero with image (described above)
2. Trust indicators: Small logos/text of farming cooperatives using app
3. Problem/solution section: 2-column split with text + supporting image
4. Features grid: 3 cards with icons, titles, descriptions
5. How it works: 3-step process with numbers, icons, brief text
6. Testimonials: 2-3 farmer quotes with photos
7. CTA section: Background image (subtle), centered text + button
8. Footer: Rich with quick links, contact, social, newsletter signup

**Dashboard Layout**:
Left sidebar navigation (always visible desktop, hamburger mobile), main content area with breadcrumbs, page title, action buttons, then content grid/feed

**Key Principles**:
- Rounded everything (buttons, cards, inputs) - no sharp corners
- Generous whitespace - never cramped
- Icons from Heroicons (outline style for friendliness)
- Photography over illustrations where possible
- Avoid all-caps except subtle data labels
- Human language: "Your farms" not "Properties", "Quality checks" not "Inspections"
